description: This file declares utility functions for synchronizing and persisting files and JSON settings within the Utils namespace, including functions for file synchronization, JSON settings persistence, and file handling operations.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes the given file to disk by opening it, flushing its buffers, and syncing to physical storage.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists a JSON setting to a file, updating the file with new key-value data and then synchronizing to disk.
